Call Lightning (Naturefriend3 Grea): R260' 1 bolt/rd inflicts 3d6 HP (DC 17 Ref half) for 16 min or 10 bolts
Calm Animals (Naturefriend1 Ench): R65' 2d4+16 HD of animals in 15' radius become docile (DC 15 Will neg) for 16 min

Good Hope (Ch3 Ench): R260' 16 targets in 15' radius gain +2 attack, damage, saves, and checks for 16 min
Greater Dispel Magic (Ch6 Abju): R260' Successful d20+16 check vs. 11+caster level cancels targeted spell or 1 spell or curse on each creature in a 20' radius
Greater Scrying (Ch7 Divi): Self views and may cast detection and communication spells on target (DC 18 Will special neg) for 16 hr
Gust Of Wind (Naturefriend2 Grea): 60' 50 MPH gust affects medium or smaller creatures (DC 16 Fort neg) for 1 rd
Lesser Globe Of Invulnerability (Ch4 Abju): 10' radius bars spell effects up to 3rd level for 16 rd
Locate Object (Ch2 Divi): Self senses direction of object or type in 1040' radius for 16 min
Mending (D0 Tran): R10' Repairs minor damage to 1 lb object

Obscuring Mist (Naturefriend1 Conj): Fog in 20' radius obscures vision for 16 min
Prestidigitation (Ch0 Evoc): R10' Self performs minor tricks for 1 hr
Protection From Evil (Ch1 Abju): Touched gains +2 AC and saves vs. evil creatures, suppresses mental control, and bars contact by nongood summoned creatures for 16 min
Repulsion (Ch6 Abju): Creatures stay 160' away (DC 17 Will neg) for 16 rd
Sleet Storm (Naturefriend3 Conj): R1040' Sleet in 40' radius blinds, inflicts DC 10 Balance to move for 16 rd
Speak With Animals (Naturefriend1 Divi): Self converses w/animals for 16 min
Speak With Plants (Naturefriend3 Divi): Self converses w/plants for 16 min
Spike Growth (Naturefriend3 Tran): R260' Spikes on vegetation in 20' sq inflict 1d4 HP each 5' movement and slow to half speed for 1 dy (DC 17 Ref neg) for 16 hr
Stoneskin (Ch4 Abju): Touched gains DR 10/adamantine for 150 HP or 160 min
Wood Shape (Naturefriend2 Tran): Self reshapes 26' cu of wood (DC 16 Will neg)

Improved Spellcasting: +10 Spell Energy/+10 Channeler Spells

Spellcasting (Divination): Knows 1 Channeler Divination spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Enchantment): Knows 1 Channeler Enchantment spell and may learn more
Spellcasting (Necromancy): Knows 1 Channeler Necromancy spell and may learn more
Brew Potion: May create potion for up to 3rd level spell
Commune With Nature: May use Commune With Nature effects 3/dy
Druidcraft: Reduces Spell Energy cost of Druid spells by 1
Naturefriend: May use Calm Animals, Entangle, Obscuring Mist, Animal Messenger, Wood Shape, Gust Of Wind, Speak With Animals, Speak With Plants, Call Lightning, Dominate Animal, Spike Growth, Sleet Storm 1/dy
Tradition Gift (Master Of Two Worlds): May control animals, plants, constructs, and/or spirits

Empathic Link: May share emotions up to 1 mile

Magical Beast: Companion is considered a magical beast for type-dependent effects
